query:
Pull out the sentence in the following 5x7 block of text. Read from left to right and use all of the letters in order:

THESE
AGULL
GLIDE
DPEAC
EFULL
YTOMY
CHAIR
ground_truth: The seagull glided peacefully to my chair.

answer_raw.final_answer: THE SEAGULL GLIDES DEEP FULLY TO MY CHAIR
